          <title>
            <string language="sl">Reducirana dolžina vrvice</string>
            <string language="en">Reduced suspension length</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringerte Aufhebunglänge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Longueur réduite de suspension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comprimento reduzido da suspensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lunghezza ridotta della sospensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μειωμένο μήκος αναστολής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Longitud reducida de la suspensión</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Postopek nadomeščanja fizikalnega nihala z matematičnim, ki ima enako periodo.</string>
            <string language="en">How to replace simple pendulum with the physical one with the same period.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizikalno nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">physical pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">matematično nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">simple pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man einfaches Pendel mit dem körperlichen 
mit der gleichen Periode ersetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment substituer le pendule simple avec le 
physique avec la même période.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como substituir o pêndulo simples com físico 
com o mesmo período.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come sostituire pendolo semplice con quello 
fisico con lo stesso periodo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να αντικαταστήσει το απλό εκκρεμές με το φυσικό 
με την ίδια περίοδο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo substituir el péndulo simple por el 
físico con el mismo período.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einfaches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
